trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Taina is looking at you as if you had two heads.
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the bundle of arrows to the villagers.
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_TAINA_000_000<tab>Oh, pardon my rudeness. I suppose I was staring too intently. I never thought I would live to see one of the allies of Ronka.

TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_TAINA_000_001<tab>Doubtless many others in the wood are as curious as I. I had the mind to deliver these arrows to my sisters, but perhaps you should do it in my stead. They would be overjoyed to meet someone so distinguished.
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_TAINA_000_010<tab>Please, deliver the arrows to my companions. They would be glad to meet an ally of Ronka.
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_VIISPEOPLEA03463000_020<tab>Y-You! An ally of Ronka, here!? To what do I owe the honor of this meeting?
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_VIISPEOPLEA03463000_021<tab>Oh? Arrows? Not what I expected, but...you have my thanks.
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_VIISPEOPLEA03463000_022<tab>How odd. Until quite recently we only used these arrows to keep others away. Yet here I am, receiving them as a kindness from an outsider.
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_VIISPEOPLEB03463000_023<tab>Greetings. What business do you have with me?
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_VIISPEOPLEB03463000_024<tab>What fortunate timing. I am soon to depart on my hunt.

TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_VIISPEOPLEB03463000_025<tab>The wood and the Viis must live together in harmony. To us, the hunt is not leisure─every part of our prey is treated with the utmost respect─from the meat to the bones to the fur.
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_VIISPEOPLEC03463000_026<tab>One of Ronka's allies, here? Is something amiss?
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_VIISPEOPLEC03463000_027<tab>Taina sent you on an errand, did she? She is bold if nothing else...

TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_VIISPEOPLEC03463000_028<tab>Nevertheless, your efforts are much appreciated. I always have need of arrows during my patrols. If ever you see me again, do not hesitate to call out. My jaculus does not bite.
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_VIISPEOPLED03463000_029<tab>By the gods, an ally of Ronka! Are you certain you meant to speak with me? If so, then...why?
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_VIISPEOPLED03463000_030<tab>Arrows, from one such as you? You have a brave soul and a kind heart. Receiving this gift...I am overwhelmed! Pray look the other way!
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_TAINA_000_040<tab>Returned at last. One of my companions has already commented on your generous deed. She scolded me, as is her nature.
TEXT_LUCKZF004_03463_TAINA_000_041<tab>However, under her wrath was joy, plain as day. Allow me to thank you again for giving my companions an experience they will not soon forget.
